description: Alright! Another app for your small children! Shanerooni, LLC has been working on a line of children's apps, and the latest is Small Wonders. This app is an interactive flashcard-style interface application with voice prompts for a multitude of categories.  There are 330 images that are included in Colors, Shapes, Alphabet, Numbers, Animals, Holidays, Automobiles, States, Bugs and 12 additional categories! You are able to select 1, several or all of the categories. Do you want your child to just practice colors? Want them to just see basic shapes? How about learning the states? You can flick left or right to change the image, tap the screen anywhere, or even set up a time interval (under 'Options') for image to change automatically!  Your newborn or infant can have a little slide show for tummy-time, or your toddler can swipe or tap through the images. Each image is shown and the word for that image is spoken by a female (default) or male voice. As with PhakePhoney, the children's mock-phone webOS application, this application is locked down making it difficult to impossible for your small child to get to other applications on your phone. This is a large application with the quality photos and sound - be patient with the download. If you have any issues you can delete and re-download the application at no charge.  If you still have issues, please email admin@shanerooni.com. Thanks, and enjoy! ***NOTE: type 'menu' to get to the menu or type 'end' to close the app!***
